body.name: Babyletto Hudson 3-in-1 Convertible Crib with Toddler Bed Conversion Kit in Washed Natural, Greenguard Gold Certified
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 18 hrs 11 mins
features: VERSATILE MODERN DESIGN: The best-selling Hudson's iconic turned-out foot, rounded spindle design, and open silhouette make it a versatile choice for the modern nursery. Complete your nursery with the Hudson 3-drawer or 6-drawer dresser.

GREENGUARD GOLD CERTIFIED: The Hudson has undergone rigorous scientific testing for over 10,000 chemical emissions and VOCs. It contributes to cleaner indoor air, creating a healthier environment for your baby to sleep, play, and grow.

3-IN-1 CONVERTABILITY AND ADJUSTABLE HEIGHT: The Hudson transitions from crib to toddler bed and daybed, with an included toddler bed conversion kit. The low profile design and 4 adjustable mattress positions make it easy to put a newborn to rest.
SAFE FOR BABE: We go the extra step to ensure your babe's safety. Finished in a non-toxic multi-step painting and staining process that is lead and phthalate safe.

SUSTAINABLE DESIGN: Made with sustainably sourced solid New Zealand pine wood, one of the most renewable woods available. Our hidden hardware ensures a clean look with no visible screws or bolts seen on the furniture exterior.
body.description: Product Description The best-selling Hudson 3-in-1 Crib combines modern design with mid-century inspiration. With an included conversion kit to go from crib to toddler bed to daybed, Hudson is built to last, made with sustainable pine wood and GREENGUARD GOLD Certified. From the Manufacturer The Hudson 3-in-1 Convertible Crib converts to both a toddler bed (rail included) and daybed, and is solidly built from sustainable New Zealand pine wood. Whether you prefer a contemporary or time-honored palette for your nursery, Hudson has you covered. Choose between a modern grey crib, clean white or natural, or a new take on family-friendly white/espresso two-tone. Takes a standard full-size crib mattress at least 51.625 x 27.25 inches and no more than 6 inches thick

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2012
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars As good as an Oeuf at half the price
reviews.reviewText: I love the Oeuf Sparrow crib yet couldn't bring myself to spend $800+ on a baby bed. I searched everywhere for a grey crib with a modern ascetic. I finally came across this Hudson crib and knew it was the one. My son's name happens to be Hudson making it that much more fitting. The wood is sturdy and of very good quality. The grey color is beautiful, although a little lighter than the Oeuf. The open slats on all four sides make it airy and comfortable for baby. It took us about an hour to put together and we had no problems. There are 4 different mattress height options. The crib sits low to the ground which makes it easier to get baby in and out without breaking your back. It comes with the toddler rail which is an added bonus. You have to buy it extra with the Oeuf at $200+. I am so happy that I found this crib. I would recommend it to any family.UPDATE: At 18 months my son figured out how to crawl out of the crib. I was so glad we already had the toddler rail as we had to do a quick change late one night to prevent my little guy from breaking his neck. It was beyond easy to unscrew the front panel of the crib and attach the toddler rail. It took us all of 10 minutes. It's a huge transition from the crib to toddler bed (for both baby and parents) but it was made so much easier because we could continue to use the crib he'd been sleeping in from the beginning. I am still so glad that I chose the Hudson crib over the Oeuf. It has held up very well and is in great condition after almost two years. I expect that we will continue to use it for at least another year or so.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Modern, Sleek, Sturdy
reviews.reviewText: I waited a LONG time for this crib to come back in stock because apparently everyone wants black cribs. But it was worth the wait.Easy to put together. I helped my husband assemble it while I was 36 weeks pregnant and we got it done in less than 30 minutes. It looks really nice and modern and the height is great; I don't have to bend over too far to put baby down/pick baby up. (For reference I'm 5'5" and crib comes to right above my bellybutton when I stand next to it.)Just a reminder: the mattress that fits this crib is NOT a standard sized mattress so you have to purchase a Babyletto mattress for it to fit perfectly. I did find that the Burt's Bees crib mattress fitted sheets fit very well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful true natural wood finish exactly as pictured! Super happy with this purchase. Seems sturdier than the last crib we had too. Fairly easy to assemble. Just measure before we assumed it was small enough to fit through a doorway and it was barely too wide so we had to take it partly back apart to move it. And just be aware it seems the finish scratches easily so be careful when moving. Other than that no complaints. It’s BEAUTIFUL and seems well made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful & well-made crib
reviews.reviewText: The crib was very well packaged and arrived on time and in perfect condition. It's very well-made and has a modern look to it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks great, easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Beautiful and light colored. We bought the natural wood finish and it's exactly what we wanted. Easy to assemble in about 1 hour by myself while husband was at work and kids were napping. Not heavy. Downside is yh3 wood doesn't seem to be a super high quality and as you can see in the pictures, there are areas where the wood isn't sanded perfectly. Also, thr bolts are visible inside and not covered, and the mattress support spring is also visible. The spring mattress could be hidden with a crib skirt if desired, if it's your style. Overall, I'm happy with the way it looks and works so far, and I'm glad my item wasn't broken upon delivery. Put together, it seems solid. It also included the toddler rail for when you convert it into a toddler bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2022
reviews.reviewText: So while the shipping took quite a bit longer than it was supposed to the crib did eventually get here and was in great condition out of the box. Very easy to put together, I’m 39 weeks pregnant and put it together by myself in about 2 hours. I will say the wood is very soft so try not to drop it or it will dent the wood. Also a tip to get the stickers off the wood without leaving behind residue, use a heat gun/hair dryer on the stickers and they peel right off without an issue. Over all I’m super happy with my purchase and I love the look of it! Now we are just waiting on baby :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2012
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars beautiful crib, looks more expensive than it was!
reviews.reviewText: My husband and I are expecting our first baby in the spring and in preparation we bought this crib. came in great condition brand new (i had my fears of damage during transportation but no issues whatsoever). Super easy to build, took my husband all of 45 minutes from start to finish, and he even complimented Babyletto for having such easy directions to follow. FINALLY a company that provides EASY directions!!! All put together, it looks beautiful and looks much more expensive than it was. We loved the style and look of the Oeuf Sparrow crib, but when we thought about it, the price of this Hudson crib (which also came with the toddler rail) and a very good 2 in 1 Colgate mattress was still less expensive than just the Oeuf crib. It's very sturdy, but easy enough to move if we need to. I love the fact that it came with the toddler rail; most cribs don't include that, and you end up spending the $100-200 later. This way we have the option for one day if we need the rail or if we have another baby we can just leave it as a crib. All in all, very satisfied with the quality and craftsmanship of this crib. I would recommend it to any new mom or dad!

I absolutely love this crib. I have two for each of my boys and they are so solid, look great, not frustrating to assemble, and overall amazing quality. I love the adjustable height for the mattress and the toddler rail that is included. This product is 100% worth the money!
Muuuuuy buen producto y de muy buena calidad fácil de armar y muy firme aparte llegó el día que quedaron Recomendado totalmente !!
We love our crib. It's exactly he look we wanted, feels sturdy, and seems well-made. No complaints! (Husband kindly assembled it so I can't speak to how that process went, but it wasn't disastrous!)

reviews.reviewTitle: Tal cual la dotó así es!! Llego antes de tiempo y en súper buen estado
reviews.reviewText: Tal como lo pensé!! Esta divina!!
Really like the look if this baby crib. The natural wood finish is very pretty. It was also easy to assemble and did not come damaged.
